## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}
### Create or update on-premise IoT sensor
{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AzureNative = Pulumi.AzureNative;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var onPremiseIotSensor = new AzureNative.Security.OnPremiseIotSensor("onPremiseIotSensor", new AzureNative.Security.OnPremiseIotSensorArgs
        {
            OnPremiseIotSensorName = "mySensor",
        });
    }

}

```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}

```go
package main

import (
	security "github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native/sdk/go/azure/security"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := security.NewOnPremiseIotSensor(ctx, "onPremiseIotSensor", &security.OnPremiseIotSensorArgs{
			OnPremiseIotSensorName: pulumi.String("mySensor"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

```

An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:security:OnPremiseIotSensor mySensor /subscriptions/20ff7fc3-e762-44dd-bd96-b71116dcdc23/providers/Microsoft.Security/iotSensors/mySensor
```
